messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Incinerator.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Greetings crew, we are looking to make a spectator sport blood game. Would you be able to make a large rage cage with shield walls and potentially a few obstacles. We can provide any resources needed via the cargo shuttle at no cost if you just use the communications console to tell us what you want.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: More details on the rage cage, if it could be roughly the size of the main cargo area (where the minebots are) that would be great. Shield walls are a must, we don't want anything that can break in combat. Any other items like meat hooks are up to you.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We're running out of power, most of staff is dead, no engineering staff - time to go home

messages.author: IckyOocky (AI)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">LOOK AT THIS CLOWN WITHOUT CLOWN SHOWS AND MASK!!!</font>
